SEARCH
Package model

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
model.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, CrazyZombie, ExplodingHead, LevelInstruction, Peashooter, Sun, Zombie
public abstract class Sprite extends Object implements Movable
The Sprite class represents a movable and drawable object in the game. It serves as a base class for other specific objects like bullets, zombies, or plants.
